name: Catch! A Fishing RPG
description:
Made for MiniLD #56.

You are a fledgling angler who has taken up the family business. Battle fish and catch them! Sell, cook, and eat seafood! Hunt down a sea monster!

-Controls-
Use the A and D keys to move and navigate menus. That's it. Only those two keys.

-Tips-
-Don't let your hunger get too high.
-Be sure to buy more bait if you run out.
-You can save your game and speed up healing at your bedroom down the hall from the kitchen.
